mapper.insert: insert into board (idx, title, contents, writer, hit) values (#{idx},#{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, #{hit})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title},contents=#{contents} where idx=#{idx}
update board set hit=hit+1 where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select idx, title, writer, regdate, hit from board order by idx desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
select idx, title, contents, writer, b.regdate, hit from board b, member m where b.writer=m.userid and idx=#{idx}
